website_summaries.verdict: A top choice in protective iPhone 7 cases that is sleek yet durable.
pros: Sleek yet very study construction, earning top marks for its protective functionality and attractive streamlined design
Users across the board love this case, and it stands out for being one of the best iPhone 7 cases available
cons: A few had issues with the rubber portion of the case staining or becoming discolored
The lack of opening for the headphone jack was an issue for others

website_summaries.verdict: A top design by a top brand in cases that is built to stand up to mishaps and looks good without detracting from the looks of your iPhone 8.
pros: Attractive, slim design by a trusted brand that fits most pockets easily while also offering superior protection from drops and bumps
2-layer design adds protection but not bulk
Precise fit without covering phone cutouts
cons: Doesn't come with a screen protector
The finish is a bit slippery

customer_reviews.title: IPHONE 8 REVIEW: Durable but beyond slippery case...
customer_reviews.text: PROS-- + Durability is without question; this thing can handle everyday drops no problem. + Cutouts don't obscure ports, speakers, and/or camera + Tight fit, as is the case with many 2-piece designs. + Can accommmodate the extra depth (though tightly) added from using the magnetic plate from the CONS-- - Very, very slippery. Annoying slippery and little to no grip when naturally held in the hand. Prepare to drop this constantly.. All in all, I really wanted to like this case but the fact that I can barely hold on to it is a real pain. Returned and will keep searching...
customer_reviews.author: Life Generalist

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek case with a bit less protection than the Defender
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I did apply a separate screen protector too. Sleek and good fit. Quality product. I have dropped my iPhone 8 (from ~3 feet) on a hard surface and it was fine. It’s not as bulky as the OtterBox Defender that I have used on previous phones and you definitely get better screen clarity if you apply a screen protector directly versus the integrated one on the Defender. The trade off is that it probably will not provide the same level of protection when dropped on its face on a non-flat surface (a rock, etc), because the Defender has more pronounced raised edges on the front than this model.
customer_reviews.author: rothm41

customer_reviews.title: Great case, and wireless charging still works
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my iPhone 8 and it's very protective. Wireless charging still works, despite it being a pretty thick case.
customer_reviews.author: perrierrocher

customer_reviews.title: Offered No Protection - Shattered Screen
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of putting this on my phone, the screen has shattered. It fell less than three feet off of the side of the couch. I would not recommend this case, and I will never purchase anything from Otterbox again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Commuter case is NOT designed for Iphone 8 - cannot put charging pin in while case is on!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and had a little trouble fitting on but thought okay new case. Then went to charge and charging pin won't fit in due to case design! Previous reviewer was absolutely correct. Unfortunately, I called Otterbox prior to purchasing this and they assured me any problems had been fixed and this version should be fine. Not true.
customer_reviews.author: jopinion

customer_reviews.title: Broken OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: I had this case for a month when the outer shell cracked open. And I have to pay to have a warranty claim processed. This case doesn't stand up like other otterboxes I have had at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Step down from the iPhone 5S version
customer_reviews.text: If I wasn't coming from a Commuter for an iPhone 5S, I would rank it either 4 or 5 stars. However, compared to the 5S version, this one is a step down in terms of "ruggedness". There is relatively less hard plastic in this version. Also, the gap between the screen and the top edge of the case is halved ( or more). This matters when the phone is placed face down on a surface. To me this case isn't worth $40 (I bought it for $13 on Black Friday).
customer_reviews.author: SMA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, it won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn’t last two months. The bottom around the charge port broke the first month, now the top cracked. I can’t recommend this as a decent case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Phone Saver
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to a new iPhone over the weekend and immediately ordered this case. I used an Otterbox Commuter Series case on my last iPhone and it saved it hundreds of drops. The previous case cracked and chipped on a couple of corners, but my iPhone 6S was in perfect condition when I removed the case to trade in. That made the case for my new iPhone 8 an obvious choice. The new case took a little effort to install (as it should being a snug fit), but fits perfectly. I haven't dropped my iPhone yet (*knock on wood*), but am confident Otterbox will protect it when I inevitably do. [Popsocket was added separately - it's not included with Otterbox.]
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Coggins

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for a couple weeks and the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple weeks and the rubber piece below the option button has already broken. No drops, just from putting my thumb there to go back to the home screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: iPhone SE (2nd gen) does not show Apple logo
customer_reviews.text: I saw "OtterBox COMMUTER SERIES Case for iPhone SE (2nd Gen)" and "same day shipping" so I Impulse bought it. It was a lesson in humility to read the product description. The description does indeed say "iPhone SE (2nd gen) does not show Apple logo." It's still a one star for me to have an exposed area without any inherent return and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 8 back glass shattered.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this style for the iPhone 6S and it worked perfectly. Purchased this one for the iPhone 8 and the first drop, less than two feet in the air onto hard wood floor, and the back screen completely shattered from the shock. Two feet!!! I was bending over to grab a book that fell and the phone slipped from my hands. I’ve dropped this exact model with an iPhone 6 and there has been no damage! Don’t purchase this because of the glass on the iPhone 8, it is a waste of money and provides no durability from two feet.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I have always had an otterbox commuter!
customer_reviews.text: I have always put my iPhone in an OtterBox Commuter. Once again, I would say I have used one through 4 iPhones. Just updated to an iPhone 8 and had to protect it with an OtterBox. I love my new one also. I love the 2 layer protection. The case is not slippery so I feel I can get a good grip on my phone and it does not easily slide off of any surface. Unfortunately they do not make the commuter wallet case with the sliding drawer anymore. I loved mine. So I have decided to add a stick on pouch which I will review with that purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DrJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put it in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: The reason I didn’t give this 5/5 stars is because I’ve had it for maybe two days and it already looks filthy. The rubber part picked up all of the dye from being in the pocket of my jeans, the back part has a big hole so the phone isn’t actually 100% protected and it’s a pain to find a screen protector that fits with this. It seems sturdy enough but I would have gotten it in Black if I knew it wouldn’t keep its color and just look old and dirty so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not for 2nd Generation SE
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a iPhone SE 2nd gen phone. I bought this case to protect it. It does that. Cosmetically it looks well until you turn it over and realize the Apple logo does not appear in the circumvented cut out of the otter box. I gave it 3 stars for that reason. The Apple logo on new 2nd gen phone is in the middle of new phone not towards the top
customer_reviews.author: MORGAN  MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this case cover. I have only owned OtterBox cases. I always used the Defender cases but got tired of always carrying a big bulky phone everywhere. Then I found the OtterBox Commuter series. I am so glad that I purchased this. It offers great protection in a smaller package. Very happy with my purchase. Please let me know if my amazon review was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but adequate.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new case for my IPhone 8 as my Speck case was getting pretty ratty. The Otterbox commuter series seemed to fit the bill. I need drop protection more than anything else. The case was relatively easy to put on the phone and seems to be well constructed. It is not waterproof and there is no screen protection. It ads very little bulk to the phone. My biggest concerns are the little rubber tab which covers the lightning port and the lack of a rubberized grip surface on the case. I believe that the lightning port tab will wear our very soon and the lack of a non-slick gripping surface is a real design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t love it, but liked it enough to buy one when to got an iPhone XR. Unfortunately if you wear darker colors you can expect some staining on the lighter rubber. And it’s a pain in the ass to have to separate the liner/bumper portion and the hard plastic part every time you need to reinsert your iPhone into the case, but the protection is well worth it. It’s thick, which can be a pain, but it’s necessary to save your iPhone from nasty falls. Even the camera is well guarded. Go ahead and get one. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Krapf

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: 1 star removed for the rear cutout being too high, this is clearly not made for the 2020 SE.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect design for 2nd Gen iPhone SE
customer_reviews.text: It's a good, solid, easy-to-hold case. I've been using Otter Commuter cases for years. I've dropped my phone many times, never had a screen break. It's pricey, so I normally give it 4 stars. I knocked off 2 more stars because the seller is marketing this product for the 2020 iPhone SE. On the new SE, Apple moved the logo on the back of the phone down an inch, so the logo doesn't line up with the round window on the back of the case. So if you put this case on the SE, you'll just have a blank circle on the back of your case. Otherwise it fits perfectly. OtterBox needs to design a new case for the SE.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Cracked After 6 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've used Otterbox before and have been really impressed by their cases. I'm not sure if I just got a dud or what, but after 6 weeks of owning this, and never dropping my phone, there is a 2 inch jaggedy crack up the center of the case. It's completely through the plastic. I can't seem to return the case, so it's being held together with electrical tape. Improvise. Adapt. Overcome.
customer_reviews.author: shannon preble

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get colors right!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item in indigo blue. I received teal/gray. I filled out the exchange form noting I got the wrong color and this time got purple. When I called amazon all they did was apologize and offer me a $5 credit for my inconvenience. I ordered this early enough to receive both the original and replacement before my daughters birthday and still have to go out and pay full retail because they can’t figure out what color blue is. Don’t waste your time unless you have a lot of time to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Otterbox cases and recently got the IPhone SE 2020. Prior to the case I had the defender series but since they did away with the screen protector I found no purpose for the bulkier version. This is great and still provides protection without the bulky ness of the DEFENDER series. Cons I’d say the second layer of plastic that clips onto the phone is pretty slippery. I wish it had a little bit more grip and also the buttons to control the volume and turn the phone off are pretty stiff You can’t really tell if you are pressing them.
customer_reviews.author: Ismini Soteropoulos

customer_reviews.title: 100% protection rate (for me, so far)
customer_reviews.text: I got my first iPhone hours before a flight and decided to travel without a phone case. At the airport, I bent over to pick up my bag and the phone fell out of my shirt pocket and cracked. Unfortunate, but thanks to AppleCare, I got it fixed and good as new. After that I got an OtterBox and have dropped my phone countless more times and with the protection of this case, I’ve not received a single new crack (I probably just jinxed myself). Needless to say, this is a worthy accessory for your phone and well priced for the protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK WITH HEADPHONES!
customer_reviews.text: The overall design and feel of the case are nice, however if you are planning on using headphones (which many people do), you will be disappointed, the hole is too small to plug anything in. My dad and I had to auger-out a hole big enough in order to make this pretty large oversight allow for headphone function. Would have returned it, but on a time limit, and this would be my second Otterbox item returned in the last 2 weeks. Strike 2! What are you guys doing?
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to say that this case fits my phone well
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of mixed reviews about this case in regards to the iPhone 8. I am happy to say that this case fits my phone well, some people were saying that it's too small for the 8 which I find to not be true. Since I went from the iPhone 5 to the 8, the only thing that has changed is the size of the charging in port. My one charger from 5 below would not stay plugged in with this case on, I noticed the charger that Apple provided me with is actually smaller than the ones you can get for cheap....due to that I only gave this case 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox some of the best
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox cases. I have used this case for many years and then some. I have bought another for my iPad. I believe they are the best made cases for dropping your phone, and keeping it safe. I like that it slides easy in and out of my pocket, non of that silicone that get's stuck on cloth! The only weakness in this particular Otterbox case is at the base where it has a slim plastic piece above the charging port...it always breaks there. They need to re-design this part of the case. Otherwise, it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight A. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: You'll get an extra case!
customer_reviews.text: Use your warranty!! I ordered this case 8 months ago and the hard case cracked on the right bottom corner. Go and make a warranty replacement on their official website (within one year of purchase). You'll definitely get your money's worth after getting an OtterBox warranty replacement. Now I have two OtterBox cases! One cracked/superglued, and the other is new and ready to go when I feel like it. They say the warranty replacement costs "6.99$" for shipping and everything— but just be aware that it may cost a little more than what they stated. I paid 20$ OtterBox (used on Amazon) and the 7.60$ Warranty replacement's shipping charge on their website. Two cases!!! Score!!!! 😉
customer_reviews.author: LCL

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT IPHONE SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this case for my new iPhone SE, and the apple logo cutout is in the wrong place. The listing advertises that it is for the iPhone SE, but it is clearly not intended for it. Now I have to go out of my way to return it, or just live with a blank cutout.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Best case I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact case on my iPhone 7 for years. Had dropped my phone more times then I care to mention. Once off a 12 foot ladder. Never any damage to the phone. I dropped my phone again over the weekend and broke the case finally. I was extremely please to have found the same case. I would definitely recommend this case. I am a contractor and I am very hard an this case. Best investment to save your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great protetion for your cell phone...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Otterbox case and second Commuter model. They all offer excellent protection for normal use. My last case was the Defender series and it was built for use in extreme environments which was a little overkill for me and made it a little difficult to get out of my pocket rather than using the belt clip it was designed for. The Commuter series doesn't add a lot of bulk to the phone and, along with a screen protector which is included in the Defender model, is more suitable for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Attractive case fits great on iPhone SE
customer_reviews.text: We put this case on the iPhone SE a little over a week ago. It seems to be working great. No complaints. The pink is an attractive color. And there’s a nice little notch or flap at the bottom that you pull out to put your charger in. When you’re done charging, the little flap slips back into place with a touch of a finger. No one has dropped it yet, so I can’t comment on that yet. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone knows this, but this phone case is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my other Otter Box actually broke after some years were put on it. I have 2 kids, and they drop my phone all the time. My iPhone has held up through it all. I would've given this phone case a 5 star review. However, the only thing that held me back was that the phone case is pretty slick. There is no grip to it. The last Otter Box I had, it had a rubber grip to it. Other than that, overall I am very pleased to have bought this phone case. I would recommend this to anyone who is interested in purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Gonzalez-Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but I felt safer with the defender.
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a defender and I should've ordered one. This case is slim, cute and clean. There is no cover for the front of the phone so iT can easily be scratched. It is very slippery because the outside case isn't rubber. I feel like if I drastically dropped my phone it would Crack. I just felt a lot safer with the defender, but if you're not too worried and like something more slim this is the case for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone SE
customer_reviews.text: This is not for an iPhone SE unlike what the title says. The little circle in the case where the iPhone logo goes on the back is in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several otterboxes over the years, including the commuter series ones. They have never failed me when dropping my phone. I am a bit clumsy and have dropped my phone several times already with this case on it and it has protected it each time. I highly recommend this case, as well as any of the other otterbox cases. The commuter one is nice because it is pretty slim. Since the back of the case is so smooth, it’s very easy to attach a pop socket as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed in a case
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case that offered great protection without being too bulky. Very pleased with the outcome. The inner part is a very good fit and the outer shell is strong enough to hold up for my use. Slides into a front shirt pocket or pants pocket easily. The surface finish is better than the 5s commuter I just got for another phone and provides better grip. Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: DIY DadTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges makes great dead skin scraper
customer_reviews.text: Sharp edges along the seams on the hard plastic cover. Uncomfortable to hold. Makes a great dead skin scraper though. Out of curiosity, I bought the same product from a local electronic store to compare. Unsurprisingly, the retail packaged product does NOT have the same issue. Is it a lower quality product sold in frustration-free packaging? Or may be it is a knockoff that I received. If neither of the above is true, then Otterbox really has a QC problem. Anyhow, I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not the right case for iPhone SE 2 (2020 Version)
customer_reviews.text: This is not the right case for iPhone SE 2 (2020 Version). The location of the apple icon does not fit the hole in the back of the case (see pic). If you can live with this awkwardness then this case will work for you. From a funtionality point of view, the case is good and stands up to the OtterBox quality.
customer_reviews.author: RSN

customer_reviews.title: Maximum protection for your phone at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Otterbox Commuter case! I purchased it about 8 months ago for a new iPhone 8. It was still considered "new" at the time. lol Anyway, the case looks just as good as it did the day I put it on there. I've dropped my phone numerous times, but the case has kept it safe. I especially love the raised lip that goes all around the screen that keeps the glass from smacking the ground if your phone should happen to fall flat on it's front. If you just want a simple, inexpensive case for your phone, I HIGHLY recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Won't Buy Any Other Brand
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my old Otterbox case. It lasted 2 years and 9 months, protecting my phone from the little fumbles that would kill an iphone without a case. Then, in the last month, I've knocked my phone off the kitchen counter twice - both times it bounced off the bottom edge of the phone and broke off part of the plastic case. When I took the case off the switch, my phone was pristine. It looks brand new despite being nearly 3 years old. Otterboxes are worth every penny (even if I did wince at the price).
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: super tough, has protected during some hard falls
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent case and protected my phone from numerous drops on to hard tile or cement floors. I've dropped it on the corners, edges, even landing completely flat on the face and not a scratch, no glass shattering. My son just got his first phone (he's 13) and I actually gave this case to him because I thought he needed the extra protection. The only thing I didn't like is that the plastic slides easily if you lay it on a non-flat surface. I put a card-holder on the back, and that helped give it some grip. But that would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: hcp22

customer_reviews.title: Good case for medium level protection, functions well.
customer_reviews.text: Good case. Seems to have better drop protection than the single layer tpu cases, but naturally a little harder to get on and off. Fits the iPhone 8 just great, buttons and such work fine. Like the lightning port cover too. Enough rubber on the side to make gripping easier, which is a good thing since the hard plastic is a little slick. Phone with case still fits in a shirt pocket fine, and ok in pants pocket. Won’t be drop testing on purpose
customer_reviews.author: RayL

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: As I bought this for my boyfriend who hates phone cases, he thinks this one is perfect. He just got a new phone and with his job, we both knew that he needed a case and he opted for this one. He likes it because it’s not too bulky and makes it easier to hold his phone, and he knows that his phone is protected while he’s at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amm

customer_reviews.title: The plastic portion of the charging port prohibits a charging cable from making a good connection. This was resolved by cutting said plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that the delivery services were outstanding thanks to UPS. Even in the snow, an extremely rare occasion for Southwest Mississippi, my case was delivered on time. I did however have to make a slight modification to the case. The plastic portion of the charging port prohibits a charging cable from making a good connection. This was resolved by cutting said plastic peace with a hand saw.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Wider and thicker outer layer please
customer_reviews.text: Functional but wish the cading lip could be a bit wider to overlap the screen protector that I used with this case. There's a 2 mm gap between the glass protector and this casing. It will get dust and peel off over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t charge without removing case!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! The outer case covers the charging input on my phone, making it so that I have to take the outer part off, rendering the case useless. Every time I go to charge the phone I have to take it off. I would return it but I already recycled the packaging :/ I have bought cases before from otter box and they have lasted years, some even longer than my phones. This one is unfortunately not as high of quality as the ones in the past. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after nearly a year, still in good working shape. Warranty Service pricey
customer_reviews.text: This case has protected my phone (along with a screen protector) from several drops, and it's lasted nearly a year. Last week, I noticed a corner of the hard plastic broke off. It's not sharp anywhere, and it still holds my phone as it did before. It's more cosmetic damage at this point. I went to the otter box site to claim the limited lifetime warranty, and just be aware that you've got to PAY $6.99 for shipping, plus any applicable taxes, so it's not really free. May be worth the cost of just updating to a new color.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged , mixed up contents.
customer_reviews.text: The inner sleeve was blue, the outer case was BLACK. It'll do, but this is a sleazy re-pack. I wanted blue, instead got this. I realize Amazon is busy, but this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: johnfcon

customer_reviews.title: Rugged & Tough
customer_reviews.text: A great iPhone case. It adds a bit more bulk to the phone, but that's to be expected. The lip this case has around the edge of the screen is about 1/8th", so I can place my phone face down without fear of scratching the screen. Last Otterbox I had lasted about 4 years and was always in my pocket, so I anticipate getting plenty of use out of this one, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Avallone

customer_reviews.title: 3rd one. Each lasted the life of the phone
customer_reviews.text: I started using Otterbox phone case several years ago after the ruggetized Nextels were no longer available. I have had an Otterbox on each of my phones since and I am confident that had it not been for the integrity and quality of the case system that my phone would not have lasted. The rubber case of the first Otterbox phone case I owned began to after about a year and Otterbox sent a new insert. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Roxgman

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking case but broke in a few months
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty and easy to hold but I’ve only had it a few months and the bottom part has cracked on both sides. It looks like a weakness in the plastic from taking the case on and off. Which I’ve only done about 3 times. If you are able to keep the case on 100% of the time then it would probably be fine. But I am disappointed with the case. I’ve used OtterBox cases since at least 2013 and I’ve never really had any issues in the past
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Very dirty!!
customer_reviews.text: This case gets easily dirty and it’s sort of slippery, if you’re here to buy because of the rave of otter boxes, do not order it, I ordered the pink one and after a couple day’s of normal activity, (going to work, going home) not doing much, the case has turned a dirty purple color and it won’t come off, I’d compare it to a dirty eraser. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McKee

customer_reviews.title: Would Choose This Over the Defender Case
customer_reviews.text: My husband was using the Defender case, and I thought that was an upgrade from the Commuter. However, my husband didn’t like the clear protective cover that goes over the screen. He said dust was able to get under the cover, and he would have to frequently take the case off to clean because it would prevent him from using the fingerprint recognition to unlock the phone. So, back to the Commuter case we went. It is basic/the opening price point for Otterbox cases, but it fits all our needs. It’s slimmer than the Defender so it fits nicer in pants pocket and in the car cup holder. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: familyof3

customer_reviews.title: Living off the brand name alone. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: There is no hole for the logo like in the photo. Knockoff?? On my old iPhone I used that to steady the phone when texting one handed. It also didn't come with with the screen protector that my older 5s comuter case came with. This is no better then a 9 dollar case. Last time I buy this brand. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cute case!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute case that provides great coverage and protection for my iphone SE. I was lucky enough to snag it at a discount and have been happy with its function. There's enough room to slip one of those magnetic plates underneath to attach it to my car's vent clip. All in all I'm very pleased with this case.
customer_reviews.author: bootybear69

customer_reviews.title: Has broken twice in the year I've had it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case in May 2018 and a couple of months ago, the bottom part of the case had broken, so I contacted Otterbox for a replacement under warranty. But now, the replacement case has broken in the same area as last time and I just can't bring myself to replace it again. Otterboxes are supposed to be the best of the best. How can I trust that if both of my cases have broken in the same place?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Harrop

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE EXPECTING THE HOLE FOR THE APPLE LOGO TO SHOW. I bought the light blue teal color it does not have the hole for the Apple logo and is a solid case throughout. It almost seems like it was defective because the hole is in the rubber but not the plastic. I saw another customer had this complaint as well. I repurchased AGAIN but in a DIFFERENT color thinking it was just the color affected, and yet again still no hole for the logo. It’s upsetting because many customers received the right product and I have tried twice and have not received the right product...
customer_reviews.author: Momathome

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox has been awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my other otter box which served my iPhone 6 and 8. It had absorbed countless falls and finally one area near the camera had cracked so I replaced it. neither phone sustained any damage. I don't use it with a screen protector so I can't comment on water resistance or total scratch resistance.
customer_reviews.author: JWL

customer_reviews.title: Outlasting Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it one week later after buying the Iphone. I've had it for about two years, part of the bottom rubber just broke but this case as saved my phone innumerable times. My phone is like new, no scratches, no marks. Once every few months I remove it from my phone just to clean it a little. I can say this is the best cover I have ever had in any phone. I can't imagine another case that is so slim and protective at the same time. Would recommend to anyone who wants a minimalist case that does not sacrifice protection.
customer_reviews.author: The Bio-Engineer

customer_reviews.title: REview of Otter Box Commuter for IPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: I have had Otter Box products before and have had excellent experiences. We all drop our cell phones occasionally and thankfully, I have not experienced any phone damage. I moved up from an IPhone 6S to an 8 and the old Otter Box was not the correct product because it covered the speakers and part of the camera. Price was excellent compared to other options and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lis C.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product came and is a good product but the color is def not what I wanted, the color on the website is way darker has no indication that it is going to be a light blue. Def not the color I wanted. I would send it back but this one took over a week to get and I have prime so I’m not trying to wait another couple weeks after sending it back to get a new case.
customer_reviews.author: Mykiea Mcafee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, like option to choose my own color combination, great price, quick dellvery.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors I chose (able to choose my own combination), excellent price, surprising quicky delivery. Product works; dropped phone a few times and no damage. Very happy w/ my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DRB-Round the World

customer_reviews.title: Well made but not a user friendly case
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this case. Too difficult to put the phone into it. Doesn't feel comfortable in my hand. The power on/ off button is now much harder to actuate thanks to the stiff rubber button cover. I had an MPERO Impact X case on my previous phone. That was a good case. Not that different from this Otter in terms of design, but much nicer to hold and made out of friendlier materials. I'm on the hunt now for a different case. I had my previous smart phone for 6 years. I can't imagine having to put up with the Otter for even a month.
customer_reviews.author: Cocktail Carillon

customer_reviews.title: Great protective case for iphone
customer_reviews.text: This OtterBox is great for protecting my husband's iphone, and I can hear him when he calls! OtterBox is a brand we can trust, and well worth the price. It has withstood multiple accidental drops, and provides protection from water as well. He is very active both working and outdoor hobbies/sports, and is rough on phone cases. He purchased another brand case when he bought his last iphone, but I constantly had to ask him to repeat what he said because it muffled his voice. No more problems hearing him since he's using this OtterBox!
customer_reviews.author: Tomcat 79er

customer_reviews.title: Want to like this, but the plastic snapped after a month
customer_reviews.text: I've had consistent screen cracks with my old Symmetry case so decided to upgrade to something sturdier. I've had about half a dozen normal drops since purchasing and the phone is in good shape, but this morning I noticed the plastic on the bottom has snapped and now catches on my pants everytime I put it in. The opening for the charge cord doesn't fit all my adapters, so I've had to take the case off a few times which is also a pain (taking off and putting on). Not sure if that snapped the plastic, but either way I'm really disappointed considering the cost of this and how little time I've had it. Feels like very cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail H.

customer_reviews.title: I'd absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Loving this so far! I've had it on my phone about two months now and I can't even express how often I drop or throw my phone on accident onto anything and everything, including cement or pavement all the time. Still, though, my phone has no issues and this credit keeps it so safe. I'd really recommend this- definitely worth the price to protect an expensive phone
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cartier

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and tight, great product
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought otterbox for for our phones. I like this model the best thus far. It fits nice and tight, it’s slim and aesthetically approving. I got the purple case. I wasn’t thrilled with the color choices, but I like it enough for the price. The otterbox has this model at almost double the price as Amazon. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very protective case!
customer_reviews.text: I have used OtterBox cases for years. They are rugged and protective. They are NOT sleek and slim, but I don't care. I would rather not have a broken iPhone, than have a super-thin case. I like the Commuter series better than the Defender series, personally. They are very similar in overall thickness, and they both have a hard part and a soft rubber part. On the Commuter, the outside is mostly the hard plastic shell, which is easier to get in and out of my pocket. On the Defender, the rubber part is on the outside, which makes it much grippier. Slightly easier to hold onto, perhaps, but really hard to get out of tight/deep pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar DeGrouch

customer_reviews.title: Overall fair product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Okay so overall, feels protective. I was going through a rough couple of weeks of dropping my phone and breaking the glass - haven't had that issue with this new case - easier to grip, but it is bigger than the more streamlined ones. The only thing that bugs me is that the cover for the charger is hard to keep open so you need hand to keep open the rubber stopper that goes in the charger and then use the other one to plug in the charger. It is inconvenient to say the least. Other than that - fine.
customer_reviews.author: AP fan

customer_reviews.title: Likely Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake Otterbox. The inside material was made out of foam, not the normal material. I've since found other reviews indicating that they're counterfeit. The case also didn't fit the iPhone 8. The material is brittle and cracked when trying to fit the outer hard plastic on. Here's to hoping that we get a refund. We'll be buying directly from Otterbox from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Wim Rumping

customer_reviews.title: The best protection for your smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, I have not owned a smartphone that wasn’t protected by an Otterbox. Yes they are a little more expensive but it’s clear that the extra money was spent on engineering, not marketing. My phones have fallen out of pockets, off tables, and from the hands of children and survived each and every time. The lifetime warranty they offer is just an added bonus. If you’re going to spend $400-$1,200 on a phone, spend the $50 to protect it properly.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Rubber liner stretches and tears.
customer_reviews.text: I can only give it an "ok" rating because of the rubber lining. within a week the bottom liner was starting to stretch and tear. i find this happening because of my pocket. pulling it in and out makes the rubber want to roll and stretching it. i have never cared for cases like this for this reason. For protection it is great! i have not dropped it yet but it is sturdy and feels like it can take a hit. If it worn't for the rubber on the bottom this would be an easy 5 star rating! I will post Pictures if requested.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Meidell

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than replacing a phone...
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox cases aren't known for being the cheapest phone case in the world. However, the expense it totally worth it when you look at the cost of repairing or replacing a broken phone. My kids have used other types of cases, and we've seen our share of broken screens. But we've had great luck with OtterBox. While I'd love a drop in the price, we'll probably continue to buy with each new phone, as they seem to be the best.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this case feels
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using Otterbox cases for awhile because they were hard to get in and out of my pocket but now with this Commuter series that is not the case. I love the way this case feels. I have dropped my Iphone 8 twice and nothing has happened to the case or phone. Great case Otterbox!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I carelessly left my phone on the top of the bed of my truck. It fell off and was ran over. When I found my phone, and removed it from the case, the above photo is what I found. Although the glass cracked on the back of my phone, it still works. I truly believe if I had an inferior case on my phone, I’d be buying a new phone. This case definitely protected my phone and I will definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough without being bulky
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had an Otterbox Defender before, and an Otterbox Symmetry— this one, though, is definitely the best of the bunch for what I need. It’s great protection for the iPhone without being big and bulky. Between me and my kids, the phone has had a few drops, and it has survived all of them unscathed. This is a great case— I got one for my teenage daughter when she got her own phone because my own has been so reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: A warrior
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as I have the commuter on my iPhone 7. He thought it was too bulky for his new iPhone 8. He also did not like the charger port plug- that can be cut off. I travel globally for work, so my phone has seen a lot (airports, rental cars, and weather), and this case has taken every drop or toss into cup holders like a warrior. Dropping from a vent mount, I never even look for damage. It fits fine in the pocket and it takes a beating with my keys next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Darth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rose gold
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I like the OtterBox Commuter Series the best. They are easy to grab (doesn’t slide out of my hand when picking it up) and offer great protection for my phone. The pink version goes well with my rose gold phone.
customer_reviews.author: harleegal

customer_reviews.title: It's an otter box
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, has held up to my wife's ability to accidentally hurl her phone across the room and contact hard objects. Last two cases, a Spigen and no name brank failed spectacularly with drops resulting in destroyed back glass on the iphone 8. So far no breaks, scratches or dings on the phone yet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the Otterbox name
customer_reviews.text: I thought it’s an otter box, it must be good. Yeah the case cracked. Also it’s irritating because the bottom is too thick to fit into my iPhone docking station. It’s also super difficult to take off and put back on. Nothing sticks to it so you can’t apply one of those kickstands. Off to find a new phone case now, I’ll stick with silicone which has always worked for me without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bond

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the slimmer look vs the Defender
customer_reviews.text: After using the Otterbox Defender for over 6 yrs, I gave the Commuter a try and added a screen protector. So far, I prefer the slimmer look. Holding the iPhone is a different experience from the Defender since sections of the cover is made of smooth, hard plastic with "secure" rubber at the corners and edges where my fingers would normally grip the iPhone. My hands need to get used to the feeling of "less" in my palm with fingers placed at the rubber areas. Dropped 2X the first week from waist height to floor and it bounced like the Defender. I'll be sure to revise this review if my liking changes.
customer_reviews.author: Running_girl

customer_reviews.title: I’d say the color is a mix of deep purple and midnight blue.
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox cases. They are comfortable to hold and very durable. I thought this case would have. bluish gray appearance. Now that I received it, I agree with other comments that state this case looks much more dark bluish/deep purplish than it looks on my screen. If you like that “indigo” color of a blue purple mix, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 9/30/19 and submitted warranty replacement on 7/2/2020 due to the plastic at the bottom of the phone breaking from normal use. Warranty claim was $6.99 for shipping. However it has protected my phone well from multiple drops, water, and other types of potential damage over the last 9 months. I would recommend this case, it is easy to hold, thinner than some others, fits in pockets, but protects the phone well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my new iPhone 8 that I wanted to take great care of thinking that the Otter Box name was as close to indestructible as I could get. I was disappointed when, just three months later, the bottom of the case completely broke off, exposing the bottom of my phone. This was after no major incident or fall. It just happened on its own. I’ve had imitation brand cases that have been through some major falls and protected my phone. I’m very irritated that the return window closed less than a month after purchasing the case.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new iPhone this summer, first time in five years, and the first thing I did afterwards was order an otter box for it! It’s still on it now in December. I always go for the commuter series, I bought a few of them for my iPhone 5 and they saved it from countless drops, and they’re not as bulky as the defender. Otter box is always my go to!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Will not protect screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and looks and it’s not bulky. I used one for years on an iPhone se and it protected it well. However my brand new iPhone 8 received a shattered screen the first time dropped from waist high. Nothing hit the screen. I’m thinking the difference in screen material is to blame I recommend a Defender series for more protection
customer_reviews.author: Ugg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this case after my last one bit the dust, but I wish I'd just purchased this one from the beginning. Sure, it's expensive, but it offers great protection for my iPhone 7 and adds a surprisingly small amount of bulk to the phone. The exterior of the case is 'grippy' enough that you don't feel like you're going to drop it, even if it's wet. However, it still slides in and out of pockets, even in tighter jeans, without any issue. It goes on and comes off easily enough for periodic deep cleaning. Great all around.
customer_reviews.author: S. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox is always Solid
customer_reviews.text: You really cannot go wrong with otterbox. I purchased this case after a cheap knock-off left my phone with a crack after a 3-foot drop. My only complaint is the plastic on the back can feel slippery. I've had otterbox cases in the past, and I expected this to be the case. The rubber shell comes around the edge of the screen. It only takes about 2 minutes to install. Otterbox is definitely a worthwhile buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse  Castellani

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This case is exactly as described. It’s fairly lightweight for an Otterbox. It has an open face, so a screen protector will need to be purchased separately (but that was made clear in the description). The back is a bit more slick than I would like as I do not like setting my phone down face down; however, it’s not a deal breaker in my opinion. The rubber around the front face of the phone does offer a bit more grab though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Keegan

customer_reviews.title: broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: this case broke --the hard plastic part-- after a fall, in 6 months of use. the warranty would replace it, but you have to pay shipping, which is a waste because the case obviously breaks easily so would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these cases
customer_reviews.text: I always get otter box cases whenever I get a new phone. I had one case that I broke- to be fair, I dropped my phone from pretty high up onto pavement. The plastic on the bottom of the case snapped, but my phone was totally fine! I immediately ordered a replacement. I usually go for the black case, but this time I got the dark blue and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Tough Case!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my iphone 8, I couldn't wait to pick out a case for it! I read product reviews and chose a case that was sturdy (I thought) and appealing. It turned out that the case I had picked out did not adequately protect the front of my phone - luckily I had added a protective glass screen, but it was cracked badly in no time! I bought this case to protect my iphone better. It is not a design I would have chosen (it is quite plain), but my phone will now be protected and in this case it is function over form!!
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Mom

customer_reviews.title: Really good case, one caveat though
customer_reviews.text: So overall, I really like this case. It is sturdy, two piece, easy to grip, and not overly bulky. The one thing that I will say is that the cover over the charging port is kind of annoying. It has a rubber plug that needs to be moved out the way each time it is plugged in- no biggie, helps keep stuff out of there, I can deal. But, the bigger issue I have noted is that the case blocks a lot of lightning cables from being fully plugged in (especially car chargers) so I end up sitting there trying to jam it in harder repeatedly under it actually connects. Otherwise, this is perfect. So, 4 stars is it.
customer_reviews.author: HPS

customer_reviews.title: Symmetry vs Commuter = Commuter.
customer_reviews.text: The Symmetry (*not in the pictures) lasted 6 months...or you can say my phone lasted 6 months... the case did not break...poor design or sacrifice for slimness. But in my opinion, the difference is unnoticeable. My Commuter lasted a solid 2 years and, within that time, took much damage. A true warrior! (*case without phone) If the Commuter can protect my phone on a construction site, with all of the 100's of drops and an unaccountable amount of miracles, why buy anything other? If you want true protection - Commuter 100%. That's why I repurchased the Commuter. (New phone - New case) (*case with phone) Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mcluckie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This OtterBox I purchased for my fathers iPhone 8 and seems to be durable without being bulky. I have always purchased OtterBox products for my phones and have not faltered yet. The commuter series has a rubber case on the inside and a hard plastic on the outside which gives me confidence that if dropped it would absorb the shock and with a lifetime warranty you can not go wrong! Highly recommended especially for the price! The case came in an easy open box which is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Sab

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd of the same case. I drop my phone so often that I managed to eventually get a little crack in the corner of the case. That was after 2 years though. And the phone doesn’t have a scratch on it. So I replaced it with the same item. Almost the same color and everything. I don’t deserve to have nice things like iPhones without an Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have always been an Otterbox fan. When I recently got an iPhone 7, I immediately wanted to protect it. This pink case is adorable. Very feminine. It fit like a glove. A little difficult to get off, but I think that’s a good thing because it means that it’s securely snug around the phone. I would hands down purchase again. Feels strong.
customer_reviews.author: kiggidykayla

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This case fits very well. Not too bulky. The only thing I didn’t like was I think the surface is a bit too smooth so I still gave a few instances of drops. But if you get one of those doohickey things to stick on the back it’ll work fine. I also have a screen protector b/c I’ve invested too much into the phone itself to not protect it.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyB

customer_reviews.title: I love otterboxes!
customer_reviews.text: If you actually care about keeping your phone safe without an annoying bulky case, the otter box commuter series is for you. I had one for my iPhone 5s back in the day that lasted years and kept my phone safe. Decided to get one for my new iPhone 8 and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OtterBox COMMUTER SERIES Case for iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) and iPhone 8/7 (NOT PLUS) - Frustration Free Packaging - BLACK
product_meta.description: Size:Single| Color:BLACK| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingYou don’t have time to precision pack your briefcase. So pack along Commuter Series — the slim, sleek case that fits into any pocket, purse or bag. Featuring two tough layers —an internal slipcover and exterior shell — Commuter Series keeps your smartphone safe from drops, bumps, dust and life on the go.
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) and iPhone 8/7 (NOT PLUS).  Images shown on iPhone 8. iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) does not show Apple logo.
DOES NOT come with a screen protector
Thin, lightweight 2-piece case provides protection against drops, bumps and shock (port covers block entry of dust and debris)
Slides easily in and out of pockets
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars20,249 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
